title: Love Beyond The Curse
overview: Chong Yang of the Yongye Clan has grown weary of his eternal life. In defiance of eternity, he plants the Noctrose to end his life. But the flower never blooms. Not until he meets Ji Nanxing, a girl from the Yan Clan. Cursed to die young, Ji Nanxing's only chance at survival is to marry Chong Yang. One longs for death, the other fights to live. Drawn together by fate, their paths intertwine in an unforgettable tale of love, sacrifice, and redemption.
